thing-type.label: DSB05 4 in One MultiSensor
thing-type.description: 4 in One MultiSensor<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gtThe Aeon Labs MultiSensor is a routing binary sensor device based on Zwave routing slave library V5.03. </p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtInclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtPress the tamper button 3 times rapidly.</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtExclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtPress the tamper button 3 times rapidly.</p&gt <p&gtNOTE:</p&gt <p&gtAs soon as the MultiSensor is removed from a z-wave network it will restore itself to factory settings. </p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtWakeup Information</h2&gt<p&gt· Waking up the Multisensor for 10 minutes:</p&gt <p&gtTry ONE of the following:</p&gt <ol&gt<li&gtMultiSensor will wake up 10 minutes after it is included into z-wave network.</li&gt <li&gtThe button is pressed 3 times, then the MultiSensor will wake 10 minutes.</li&gt <li&gtIf configured, the MultiSensor can wake 10 minutes when on power</li&gt </ol&gt

parameter.name: config_2_1
parameter.label: 2: Wake up for 10 minutes when batteries are inserted

parameter.name: config_3_2
parameter.label: 3: On time
parameter.description: On time before sending off command<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtHow long should the device associated to multi sensor keep state On before sending it Off command (if the value is bigger than 255, the value would be rounded to next integer in minutes)</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_101_4_000000FF
parameter.label: 101: Which reports to send to group 1
parameter.description: Group 1 automatic report list<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtThe value is a combination number made up of the sum of the values for the individual sensors and battery.</p&gt <p&gtThe sensors have the values:</p&gt <p&gtTemperature=32</p&gt <p&gtHumidity=64</p&gt <p&gtLightlevel=128</p&gt <p&gtBattery=1 </p&gt <p&gtTherefore if you want all sensors and the battery report set this value to <strong&gt225</strong&gt (recommended)</p&gt</p&gt
